title: 3bdr/2bath House for rent in Des Plaines, fully updated!
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post
Single family home for rent in Des Plaines.
First floor with 3 bedrooms, kitchen, family/dining room.
Hardwood floor in all rooms, ceramic tiles in kitchen.
Fully finished basement with custom built-in cabinet, one extra room for use as office with storage closeth, laundry room with new washer/dryer, craft room and utility room.
Plenty of parking space and storage with 1.5 car garage and long driveway parking.
Easy access to attic for additional storage.
Nice size yard with new cement patio and storage shed.
Perfectly located, walking distance from Forest, Algonquin and Maine West schools.
Short ride or walking distance to grocery shops, restaurants, post office, Prairie Lakes park district center and pool.
1 mile from downtown Des Plaines, library and shops.
